title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% completed assessments, reducing discontinuation risk by 30%
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Automate reminders at day 3 to improve ePRO completion rates
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA requiring PRO data in trials within 12 months
**CONCERN**: Baseline differences across studies may affect comparability of PRO outcomes
